title: Add relative path expansion logic to smart-bootstrap.md
description: Implement path expansion to handle relative paths: ~ (home directory), . (current directory), .. (parent directory), and simple filenames. Add logic to expand these to absolute paths before validation. This allows users to type '~/Documents/spec.md' instead of full absolute paths.
notes: Subtask of 89. COMPLETED: Added 'Path Handling (Smart Detection)' section to smart-bootstrap.md (lines 99-126). Implements expansion logic for all path types: absolute, tilde (~), current (.), parent (..), and relative paths. Provides clear expansion process and examples. Documented that this is foundation for Tasks 106-108. Foundation for smart path detection now in place.
user_benefit: Users can use familiar shell shortcuts instead of typing full paths
